2_company_overview.2_1_company_description:
Acme Corp is a mobile productivity platform providing high-velocity teamwork solutions for SMBs.

Acme Corp provides a mobile-first user experience designed for hybrid and field-based work.

Acme Mobile provides a universal loyalty platform that replaces physical loyalty cards with a QR-based mobile wallet and offers merchants an AI-driven analytics dashboard.

Acme Corp is a mobile-first productivity software company serving small and mid-sized businesses (SMBs). The company focuses on enabling high-velocity teamwork through an integrated mobile workspace combining tasks, documents, asynchronous communication, and AI-assisted prioritization.
2_company_overview.2_2_problem_statement:
Knowledge workers juggle 6–10 tools daily leading to context switching costs. Mobile-first teams lack reliable workflows, offline access, and governance on the go. SMBs adopt tools that fail to scale securely.

Consumers manage dozens of physical and digital loyalty cards, creating friction at checkout. Merchants lack real-time visibility into customer behavior and campaign performance.
2_company_overview.2_3_solution_overview:
Acme's solution is an all-in-one, mobile-first workspace with features like tasks & lightweight project management, docs & structured knowledge, async video & voice updates, and embedded AI summarization and prioritization.

Mobile-first user experience, offline and low-bandwidth operation, integrated async video and voice updates, on-device AI processing to address privacy and compliance concerns.

Acme replaces physical loyalty cards with a single universal QR-based mobile wallet. Merchants access an AI-driven analytics dashboard for customer insights, segmentation, and campaigns. Deployment in <1 day with no additional hardware required.

The company provides an integrated mobile workspace combining tasks, documents, asynchronous communication, and AI-assisted prioritization.
2_company_overview.2_4_business_model: Revenue through bottom-up adoption starting with a free tier, followed by sales-assisted expansion into enterprise contracts. Pricing per user/month is €12 for Starter, €24 for Pro, and €49 for Enterprise version.

3_market_and_go_to_market.3_1_market_overview:
TAM: €12.5B in global SMB collaboration & productivity software. SAM: €3.1B target in mobile-first and hybrid-work SMBs in EU & North America. SOM: €450M initial market (10–500 employee companies). Tailwinds include BYOD, async-first work, AI copilots, SMB SaaS consolidation.

Shift to mobile-first workflows, rising adoption of asynchronous collaboration models, SMB-driven consolidation of SaaS tools, acceleration of AI adoption, increased emphasis on GDPR-aligned software vendors.

EU Retail Loyalty Software TAM: €18B. Serviceable Market (Nordics & DACH): €1.2B. Initial focus on SMB retailers with 1–50 locations. Tailwinds: cashless payments, mobile wallets, data-driven retail marketing.
3_market_and_go_to_market.3_3_customer_acquisition_and_sales_motio:
Bottom-up adoption via free tier transitioning to sales-assisted expansion and enterprise contracts. Primary channels include content, app marketplaces, and founder-led sales.

Bottom-up purchasing behavior enabling rapid team-level entry and expansion-driven growth.

The Sales Lead is responsible for pipeline development, enterprise pilots, and expansion deals. The Customer Success Manager handles onboarding, retention, and account expansion.
3_market_and_go_to_market.3_4_competitive_landscape:
Indirect competitors: Notion, Slack, Asana. Direct overlap: ClickUp, Monday.

Direct competitors include ClickUp and Monday.com. Indirect competitors include Notion, Slack, and Asana.
3_market_and_go_to_market.3_5_competitive_differentiation_and_win_:
Acme is designed mobile-first with offline sync, low-bandwidth reliability, on-device AI for privacy-sensitivity, and fast SMB deployment velocity.

Mobile-first user experience, offline and low-bandwidth operation, integrated async video and voice updates, on-device AI processing, fast deployment and low operational overhead.

4_product_and_technology.4_1_product_description:
Offers features like tasks & project management, structured knowledge, async video & voice, and AI summarization.

Mobile-first user experience, offline and low-bandwidth operation, integrated async video and voice updates, on-device AI processing.

Acme offers a universal QR-based mobile wallet for loyalty programs and an AI-driven analytics dashboard for merchants.

Integrated mobile workspace combining tasks, documents, asynchronous communication, and AI-assisted prioritization.
4_product_and_technology.4_2_product_maturity_and_roadmap: Q3: SOC 2 Type I audit, calendar integrations. Q4: Offline mode v2, admin analytics, SSO/SAML. Q1: ML-based task prioritization, workflow marketplace. Q2: Industry templates.
4_product_and_technology.4_3_technology_stack_and_architecture:
On-device AI processing.

Primary data residency on AWS eu-west-1 (Ireland); AES-256 for data at rest; TLS 1.2+ for data in transit; Role-based access control (RBAC) with Single Sign-On (SSO) via Google Workspace
4_product_and_technology.4_4_technical_dependencies_and_constrain: Amazon Web Services (AWS) — infrastructure hosting; Stripe — payment processing; Sentry — application monitoring and error tracking

6_team_and_organization.6_1_founders_and_executive_team: Chief Executive Officer (CEO): Aino Laine, Chief Technology Officer (CTO): Mikko Virtanen, Head of Product: Sara Niemi
6_team_and_organization.6_2_key_staff_and_advisors:
Advisors: former retail CIOs and payments industry executives.

Senior iOS Engineer, Senior Android Engineer, Backend Engineer, Sales Lead, Customer Success Manager, Marketing Manager
6_team_and_organization.6_3_organization_structure_and_hiring_pl: Current headcount is 10 full-time employees. Hiring Plan: Add 1 Account Executive, 1 DevOps / Site Reliability Engineer, and 1 Data Analyst in the next 6-9 months.
6_team_and_organization.6_4_founder_commitment_and_incentives: Founder turnover: 0%. Average employee tenure: 1.4 years.

7_customers_and_traction.7_2_named_customers_and_leads: 20 enterprise pilots converting to paid rollouts.
7_customers_and_traction.7_3_traction_and_revenue_metrics:
ARR: €6.0M, MRR: €500k, Net Revenue Retention: 122%, Gross Margin: 82-84%, CAC payback < 12 months, Avg. ACV: €9.6k

MRR €500k (July 2025) | 12% MoM growth. 150k monthly active consumers 400 paying merchant locations. Average merchant ARPU: €1,250 / year. Churn < 2.5% monthly (merchant).
7_customers_and_traction.7_4_customer_validation_status:
Evidence of paid customers with 20 enterprise pilots converting to paid rollouts.

Data Processing Agreements (DPAs) executed with enterprise customers

8_operations_and_compliance.8_1_internal_processes:
Standardized onboarding and service delivery processes for customers, including technical onboarding, enablement, and go-live support.

Describes Acme’s data protection, privacy, and security governance focusing on data handling principles such as data minimization, purpose limitation, encryption, access control including RBAC and multi-factor authentication, and audit logging.

Product and engineering teams operate in cross-functional sprints with shared ownership of delivery and quality.

General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) compliance implemented across all products and internal processes; Automated vulnerability scanning performed monthly; High-severity vulnerabilities patched within 7 days
8_operations_and_compliance.8_2_tooling_and_infrastructure:
SaaS infrastructure only

Primary data residency on AWS eu-west-1 (Ireland); Role-based access control (RBAC) with Single Sign-On (SSO) via Google Workspace
8_operations_and_compliance.8_3_regulatory_and_compliance_status:
GDPR-aligned processes, annual penetration testing, and SOC 2 audit roadmap.

Increased emphasis on GDPR-aligned and privacy-conscious software vendors in the EU market.

GDPR compliance; SOC 2 Type II audit currently in progress; ISO 27001 certification targeted for 2026
8_operations_and_compliance.8_4_regulatory_timing_and_dependency_ris: SOC 2 Type II report expected by Q4 2025

9_financials.9_3_unit_economics:
Blended ARPU growing to €26 by 2026 | Gross churn stabilizing at 8–10% | NRR 120%+

Gross Margin and CAC metrics provided.

Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC): €45. Lifetime Value (LTV): €310. LTV / CAC: 6.9x.

10_funding_and_capital_structure.10_3_current_fundraising_round: Raising €5M to fund 18 months of runway toward Series A.
